title: City Employment Classification Definitions
description: This dataset provides classification level detail and definitions regarding the City's employment classifications. See the City Employment Compensation Plan dataset for hourly compensation rates.

columns.name: effectiveDate
columns.description: Date in which current version of classification became/becomes effective

columns.name: Title
columns.description: Classification Title (may not always match the position working title)

columns.name: Definition
columns.description: JOB DESCRIPTION: Description of the classification

columns.name: Distinguishing Features
columns.description: JOB DESCRIPTION: What distinguishes this classification from others

columns.name: Supervision Exercised
columns.description: JOB DESCRIPTION: What, if any supervision may be exercised by individuals in this classification

columns.name: Examples of Important and Essential Duties
columns.description: JOB DESCRIPTION: Examples of the duties that an individual in this classification may be expected to perform

columns.name: Knowledge, Skills and Abilities
columns.description: REQUIREMENTS: Expected knowledge, skills, and abilities for an individual in this classification

columns.name: Minimum Qualifications
columns.description: REQUIREMENTS: The minimum qualifications that must be satisfied prior to appointment for this classification.

columns.name: Change Reason
columns.description: The reason for the most recent change to this classification

columns.name: Union
columns.description: The labor union for the job classification

columns.name: FLSA Status
columns.description: The FLSA status for the job classification

columns.name: Abolished
columns.description: Whether the job classification has been abolished

columns.name: Experience and Training
columns.description: Experience and training required in the job classification

columns.name: License or Certificate
columns.description: Licenses and certificates required for the job classification
